plays.text: Penalty to Antti Laaksonen 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mike Leclerc 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Jeremy Stevenson
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Holding Wes Walz
Penalty to Samuel Pahlsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Matt Johnson
Penalty to Keith Carney 2 minutes for Slashing Antti Laaksonen
Penalty to Ruslan Salei 2 minutes for Interference Jim Dowd
Goal scored by Petr Sykora assisted by Mike Leclerc and Adam Oates
